attributes.action: Abandon plans to misappropriate With Profits Insurance Fund Assets, the property of the Electorate, not the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK Pension Industry has been shattered by a wholely inappropriate, and still arguably criminal raid on the private funds of the British people, with the abolition of Dividend Relief.

New plans recently leaked reveal a scheme to raid the reserves funds of With Profits Policies, to fund liabilities of those pension funds that have folded since 2005, many whom had suffered terminally from the Dividend changes.

Enough is enough, this is arguably criminal illegal stealing of the electorates money with no mandate or authority, and is a National Disgrace for which the Government will pay dearly in the next Election.  This is a "Raid too Far".
